sourcesContent:
<ion-header>
  <ion-toolbar>
    <ion-title color="primary">Settings</ion-title>
    <ion-buttons slot="start">
      <ion-button (click)="switchTabs('/tablinks/home')">
        <ion-icon name="arrow-back" color="secondary" size="large"></ion-icon>
      </ion-button>
    </ion-buttons>
  </ion-toolbar>
</ion-header>

<ion-content>
  <ion-row class="ion-justify-content-center ion-padding-vertical">
    <ion-button (click)="clearData()" color="danger">Clear All Data</ion-button>
  </ion-row>
</ion-content>
